lead_paragraph: The deaths of seven C.I.A. operatives in Afghanistan have highlighted the agency’s transformation to a paramilitary organization at the vanguard of America’s wars.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

snippet: The deaths of seven C.I.A. operatives in Afghanistan have highlighted the agency’s transformation to a paramilitary organization at the vanguard of America’s wars.

headline.main: C.I.A. Takes On Bigger and Riskier Role on Front Lines
headline.print_headline: C.I.A. Takes On Expanded Role On Front Lines
headline.sub: Deaths in Afghanistan Highlight New Risks;

byline.contributor: Alissa J. Rubin contributed reporting from Kabul, Afghanistan.
